backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing authorization, user profiles, builder assistant sessions, and CRUD for opportunities with sorting utilities.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting removal of a homepage hero headline and listing affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for numerous frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and configs.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode tokens, and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the app root and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app in ThemeProvider with toaster notifications.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout shell providing header with navigation, mobile menu, main content wrapper, and footer.
frontend/src/components/auth/BuilderLogi: Renders a login screen using Internet Identity with status handling and a call to initiate authentication.
frontend/src/components/BrowseFiltersBar: Filter bar component offering controls for location, category, barrier level, and sort mode with clear-all functionality.
frontend/src/components/builder/BuilderS: Layout wrapper combining sidebar sessions, chat transcript, and message composer for the builder UI.
frontend/src/components/builder/ChatComp: Textarea and send button component that submits user messages with validation and loading states.
frontend/src/components/builder/ChatTran: Scrollable chat view showing user and assistant messages with auto‑scrolling and loading/empty placeholders.
frontend/src/components/builder/ProfileS: Dialog prompting the user to enter and save their name to create a profile before using the builder.
frontend/src/components/builder/Sessions: Lists builder sessions, allows creating new ones, and highlights the active session with loading placeholders.
frontend/src/components/FeaturedOpportun: Displays featured opportunities with loading, error, and empty states using OpportunityCard components.
Displays an opportunity with badges, score, description, and actions to view details or open an external link.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages the backend actor based on identity, auto‑invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBuilderMessages.ts: Fetches session messages and provides a mutation to append new messages, invalidating queries on update.
frontend/src/hooks/useBuilderSessions.ts: Retrieves user sessions and exposes a mutation to create new sessions with automatic query refreshing.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Loads and saves the current user's profile through the actor, managing loading and mutation states.
frontend/src/hooks/useEnsureXerisFeature: Ensures a specific featured opportunity exists by calling the backend once and invalidating related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useFeaturedOpportunit: Hook using react-query to fetch featured opportunities from the actor when available.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication using Dfinity AuthClient, including login state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useOpportunities.ts: Hook fetching a filtered list of opportunities from the actor with react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useOpportunity.ts: Hook fetching a single opportunity by ID via the actor.
Mutation hook to submit a new opportunity and invalidate related queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom color tokens, dark mode values, and utility classes for gradients and text effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry wiring ReactDOM, react-query client, InternetIdentityProvider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Static About page describing mission and features with card-based sections.
frontend/src/pages/BrowsePage.tsx: Browse page with filters, sorting, featured section, and opportunity listing driven by URL search params.
frontend/src/pages/BuilderPage.tsx: Authenticated builder interface managing sessions, messages, profile setup, and AI-assisted chat workflow.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero, feature highlights, and navigation buttons to the builder and browse pages.
frontend/src/pages/OpportunityDetailsPag: Displays detailed information for a single opportunity with loading, error, badges, and external link actions.
frontend/src/pages/SubmitOpportunityPage: Form page for submitting new opportunities with validation, state management, and submission handling.
frontend/src/utils/builderAssistant.ts: Rule-based generator that creates deterministic app plans by analyzing prompts for features and app types.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters across routing modes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, shadows, typography, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Holds the current project state, including metadata, a rebrand summary, and a list of existing features with IDs, titles, requirements, and versions. Contains no architectural notes or known issues beyond marking the file as a fix request.
